TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RecognizedPhrase extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含語音辨識器所產生的有關已辨識輸入的詳細資訊。

span.span: Contains detailed information, generated by the speech recognizer, about the recognized input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Confidence As Single
public: property float Confidence { float get(); };

summary.span: 取得辨識器指派的值，這個值表示 符合指定之輸入的可能性。

span.span: Gets a value, assigned by the recognizer, that represents the likelihood that a matches a given input.

value.span: 正確辨識片語的確定性相對量值。

span.span: A relative measure of the certainty of correct recognition of a phrase.

value.span: 此值介於 0.0 到 1.0，分別表示低度到高度的信賴值。

span.span: The value is from 0.0 to 1.0, for low to high confidence, respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable ConstructSmlFromSemantics() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回 物件中語意資訊的語意標記語言 (SML) 文件。

span.span: Returns a semantic markup language (SML) document for the semantic information in the object.

returns.span: 傳回 語意的 SML 描述，作為 [XPath](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms256115.aspx) 可巡覽物件。

span.span: Returns an SML description of the semantics of the as an [XPath](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms256115.aspx) navigable object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Grammar As Grammar
public: property System::Speech::Recognition::Grammar ^ Grammar { System::Speech::Recognition::Grammar ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 語音辨識器用來傳回 的 。

span.span: Gets the that the speech recognizer used to return the .

value.span: 語音辨識器用來識別輸入的文法物件。

span.span: The grammar object that the speech recognizer used to identify the input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HomophoneGroupId As Integer
public: property int HomophoneGroupId { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得片語同音字群組的識別項。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the homophone group for the phrase.

value.span: 片語同音字群組的識別項。

span.span: The identifier for the homophone group for the phrase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 語音辨識器會將群組識別項指派給所有發音相同的辨識替代項。The speech recognizer assigns a group identifier to all recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation. 對於具有唯一的發音的每個替代，辨識器會建立同音字群組。For each alternate that has a unique pronunciation, the recognizer creates a homophone group. 語音辨識器產生的識別項的每個辨識作業，新的群組，並識別項不能用來比較從替代項目從不同的辨識作業產生。The speech recognizer generates new group of identifiers for each recognition operation, and the identifiers cannot be used to compare alternates from generated from separate recognition operations. 例如，包含替代項目"tale"、"tail"和"則發出警示 」 的辨識結果的前兩個替代項目會屬於一個同音字群組，和最後一個替代將會是第二個同音字群組的單一成員。For example, for a recognition result that contained the alternates "the tale", "the tail", and "the ale", the first two alternates would belong to one homophone group, and the last alternate would be the single member of a second homophone group.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Homophones As ReadOnlyCollection(Of RecognizedPhrase)

summary.span: 取得與此辨識片語發音相同的辨識替代項目集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation as this recognized phrase.

value.span: 與此辨識片語發音相同之辨識替代項目的唯讀集合。

span.span: A read-only collection of the recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation as this recognized phrase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回所有其他辨識替代項目與此辨識片語發音相同。This property returns all other recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation as this recognized phrase. 例如，包含替代項目、"tale of 」 和 「 結尾 」 的辨識結果，第一個鐨"tale"同音字集合會包含第二個片語 「 結尾 」。For example, for a recognition result that contained the alternates, "the tale" and "the tail", the homophones collection for the first alternate, "the tale", would contain the second phrase, "the tail". 第二個替代，也就是 「 結尾 」 的同音字集合會包含第一個片語"tale"。The homophones collection for the second alternate, "the tail", would contain the first phrase, "the tale".

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReplacementWordUnits As Collection(Of ReplacementText)

summary.span: 取得在語音轉文字正規化過程中，語音辨識器變更之文字的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets information about the text that the speech recognizer changed as part of speech-to-text normalization.

value.span: 物件的集合，這些物件描述語音辨識器在將已辨識的輸入正規化時，所取代的文字區段。

span.span: A collection of objects that describe sections of text that the speech recognizer replaced when it normalized the recognized input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 語音辨識程序的一部分，語音辨識器正規化成一個顯示的表單已辨識的輸入。As part of the speech recognition process, the speech recognizer normalizes the recognized input into a display form. 語音的輸入，"25 （美元） 」，會產生的辨識結果，例如其中屬性包含單字、"20"、"5"和"（美元） 」，而屬性包含"$25.00"片語。For example, the spoken input, "twenty five dollars", generates a recognition result where the property contains the words, "twenty", "five", and "dollars", and the property contains the phrase, "$25.00". 如需文字正規化的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about text normalization, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Semantics As SemanticValue

summary.span: 取得與已辨識片語相關聯的語意資訊。

span.span: Gets the semantic information that is associated with the recognized phrase.

value.span: 與已辨識片語相關聯的語意資訊。

span.span: The semantic information associated with the recognized phrase.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Text As String
public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得語音辨識器從已辨識輸入產生的正規化文字。

span.span: Gets the normalized text generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

value.span: 語音辨識器從已辨識輸入產生的正規化文字。

span.span: The normalized text generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 語音辨識程序的一部分，語音辨識器執行可辨識的輸入顯示表單中的語音轉文字的正規化。As part of the speech recognition process, the speech recognizer performs speech-to-text normalization of the recognized input into a display form. 語音的輸入，"25 （美元） 」，會產生的辨識結果，例如其中屬性包含單字、"20"、"5"和"（美元） 」，而屬性包含"$25.00"片語。For example, the spoken input, "twenty five dollars", generates a recognition result where the property contains the words, "twenty", "five", and "dollars", and the property contains the phrase, "$25.00". 如需文字正規化的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about text normalization, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Words As ReadOnlyCollection(Of RecognizedWordUnit)

summary.span: 取得語音辨識器從已辨識輸入產生的單字。

span.span: Gets the words generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

value.span: 語音辨識器針對已辨識輸入所產生之 物件的集合。

span.span: The collection of objects generated by a speech recognizer for recognized input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會包含從輸入之前的辨識器語音轉文字正規化結果的語音辨識器所產生的單字。This property contains the words produced from the input by the speech recognizer prior to the recognizer's speech-to-text normalization of the result. 語音的輸入，"25 （美元） 」，會產生的辨識結果，例如其中屬性包含單字、"20"、"5"和"（美元） 」，而屬性包含"$25.00"片語。For example, the spoken input, "twenty five dollars", generates a recognition result where the property contains the words, "twenty", "five", and "dollars", and the property contains the phrase, "$25.00". 如需文字正規化的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about text normalization, see .
